name: The Daunting Unknown
description:
You are an archeologist who suddenly wakes up in a mysterious temple. You have to get free from the grasp of the creatures and monsters in there. Maybe they were once normal people, but now they are cursed by an unknown spell. Uncover mysteries, explore the unknown and prepare to have sharp reflexes in The Daunting Unknown. 

CONTROLS:

A, D & ARROW KEYS TO MOVE LEFT & RIGHT

SPACE TO JUMP

RIGHT-CLICK TO DASH

LEFT-CLICK TO SHOOT

E AND HOVER WITH MOUSE CURSE TO INTERACT WITH THE CHEST

Made by;

Pixel Artist

Velislav Pachamanov

Programmers

Maxim Georgiev & Stilian Batinkov

Level Designer

Stefan Chaushev

Music and SFX
